summary: Changes the greenish dirty water color to a realistic, blue one.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center]WHAT IS THIS?[/center][/size]  
[center][size=2] This is my customized water color of Realistic Water 2 through Creation Kit for ENB. Without ENB, water will look funny and shiny. You obviously need RW2 to get it work. [/size]    [center][size=5]
INSTALL[/size][/center]  
  
[size=2][center]Simply drag the .esp to your ''Data'' and overwrite it. I also uploaded my ENB water parameters so you can get the exact thing in screenshots. Enjoy![/center][/size][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
